noun.description: A minute or microscopic animal of the class or phylum Rotatoria; (now) specificallya rotifer.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the class or phylum Rotatoria. Now rare.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in Andrew Pritchard (1804–1882), microscopist. From Rotatoria + -ian. With use as adjective compare earlier rotatorial.
